stencils.title: Start Compensation Event
stencils.description: Compensation handling. This event is only used inside of a event subprocess.
stencils.description_de: Behandeln von Kompensierung. Die Verwendung ist ausschließlich innerhalb eines Ereignis-Unterprozesses vorgesehen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>          <polygon stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.4" points="15,9 15,23 8,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <polygon stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.4" points="22,9 22,23 15,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Start Signal Event
stencils.description: A process instance is started based on signalling across different processes. (One signal thrown can be caught multiple times)
stencils.description_de: Eine Prozess-Instanz wird auf Basis von Signalen über mehrere Prozesse hinweg gestartet. (Auf dasselbe Signal kann an mehreren Stellen reagiert werden)
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <path        d="M 8.7124971,21.247342 L 23.333334,21.247342 L 16.022915,8.5759512 L 8.7124971,21.247342 z"        id="triangle"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Start Multiple Event
stencils.description: A process instance is started upon occurence of one out of a set of possible events.
stencils.description_de: Eine Prozess-Instanz wird beim Eintreten eines von mehreren möglichen Ereignissen gestartet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />     <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>      <path    style="fill:none;   fill-opacity:1;   stroke:#000000;   stroke-width:1.4;   stroke-linejoin:bevel;   stroke-opacity:1"         d="M 20.834856,22.874369 L 10.762008,22.873529 L 7.650126,13.293421 L 15.799725,7.3734296 L 23.948336,13.294781 L 20.834856,22.874369 z"        id="middlepolygon" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Start Parallel Multiple Event
stencils.description: A process instance is started upon occurence of all possible events.
stencils.description_de: Eine Prozess-Instanz wird nach dem Eintreten von allen möglichen Ereignissen gestartet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />          <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <path        d="M 6.75,13 L6.75,19 L13,19 L13,25.75 L19,25.75 L19,19 L25.75,19 L25.75,13 L19,13 L19,6.75 L13,6.75 L13,13z"        id="path9"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />          <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Message Event
stencils.description: This event reacts on the arrival of a message.
stencils.description_de: Das Nachrichten-Zwischenereignis wartet bis auf den Empfang einer Nachricht und setzt daraufhin die Prozessausführung fort.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />           <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>       <g id="messageCatching">   <path stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1" d="M8,11 L8,21 L24,21 L24,11z M8,11 L16,17 L24,11" />  </g>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Timer Event
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a certain point in time is reached or a particular duration is over.
stencils.description_de: Im Laufe der Prozessausführung muss für eine bestimmte zeitlich festgelegte Dauer bzw. auf das Eintreten eines Zeitpunktes gewartet werden bis die Ausführung fortgesetzt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>          <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />          <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="10" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <path d=" M 16 6 L 16 9       M 21 7 L 19.5 10       M 25 11 L 22 12.5       M 26 16 L 23 16       M 25 21 L 22 19.5       M 21 25 L 19.5 22       M 16 26 L 16 23       M 11 25 L 12.5 22       M 7 21 L 10 19.5       M 6 16 L 9 16       M 7 11 L 10 12.5       M 11 7 L 12.5 10       M 18 9 L 16 16 L 20 16" fill="none" stroke="black" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Escalation Event
stencils.description: This event reacts on the escalation of a case. It needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_de: Reagiert auf die Eskalation des Vorgangs. Dieses Ereignis muss zwingend an den Rand einer Aktivität angeheftet werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">          <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />           <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>       <path        d="M 16,8.75 L22,23.75 L16,17 L10,23.75z "        id="path9"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />        <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Conditional Event
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a changed business condition or business rule matches.
stencils.description_de: Im Laufe der Prozessausführung muss auf eine veränderte Bedingung oder eintretende Geschäftsregeln gewartet werden bis die Ausführung fortgesetzt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />           <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>      <rect x="8" y="8" width="16" height="16" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />     <path d=" M 10 10 L 22 10       M 10 14 L 22 14       M 10 18 L 22 18       M 10 22 L 22 22" fill="none" stroke="black" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Link Event
stencils.description: Off-page connectors. Two corresponding link events correspond to a sequence flow.
stencils.description_de: Ein auslösendes und ein eintretendes Link-Ereignis mit dem selben Namen entspricht einer gedachten Sequenzfluss-Kante.

stencils.title: Intermediate Error Event
stencils.description: Catches a named error, which was thrown be an inner scope (e.g. subprocess). This event needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_de: Behandelt einen in einem inneren Scope geworfenen Fehler (z.B. aus einem Unterprozess). Dieses Ereignis muss zwingend an den Rand einer Aktivität angeheftet werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <path          style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.5;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:10"          d="M 22.820839,11.171502 L 19.36734,24.58992 L 13.54138,14.281819 L 9.3386512,20.071607 L 13.048949,6.8323057 L 18.996148,16.132659 L 22.820839,11.171502 z"          id="errorPolygon" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Cancel Event
stencils.description: Reacts on a transaction, which was cancelled inside an inner scope (e.g. subprocess). This event needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_de: Behandelt eine in einem inneren Scope abgebrochene Transaktion (z.B. aus einem Unterprozess). Dieses Ereignis muss zwingend an den Rand einer Aktivität angeheftet werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <path        d="M 7.2839105,10.27369 L 10.151395,7.4062062 L 15.886362,13.141174 L 21.621331,7.4062056 L 24.488814,10.273689 L 18.753846,16.008657 L 24.488815,21.743626 L 21.621331,24.611111 L 15.886362,18.876142 L 10.151394,24.611109 L 7.283911,21.743625 L 13.018878,16.008658 L 7.2839105,10.27369 z"        id="cancelCross" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.7" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Compensation Event
stencils.description: Compensation handling in case of partially failed operations. This event needs to be attached to the boundary of an activity.
stencils.description_de: Eine gezielte Kompensation aufgrund von teilweise fehlgeschlagenen Operationen. Dieses Ereignis muss zwingend an den Rand einer Aktivität angeheftet werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <polygon stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.4" points="15,9 15,23 8,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <polygon stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.4" points="22,9 22,23 15,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Signal Event
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until a particular signal is catched. Signalling can happen across different processes.
stencils.description_de: Im Laufe der Prozessausführung wird auf das Auffangen eines Signals gewartet bis die Ausführung fortgesetzt wird. Die Signalgebung kann über verschiedene Prozesse hinweg stattfinden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />          <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>  <path     id="signalCatching"        d="M 8.7124971,21.247342 L 23.333334,21.247342 L 16.022915,8.5759512 L 8.7124971,21.247342 z"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Multiple Event
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until one out of a set of possible events is triggered.
stencils.description_de: Im Laufe der Prozessausführung wird auf eines von mehreren möglichen Ereignissen gewartet bis die Ausführung fortgesetzt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />          <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>      <path    style="fill:none;   fill-opacity:1;   stroke:#000000;   stroke-width:1.4;   stroke-linejoin:bevel;   stroke-opacity:1"         d="M 20.834856,22.874369 L 10.762008,22.873529 L 7.650126,13.293421 L 15.799725,7.3734296 L 23.948336,13.294781 L 20.834856,22.874369 z"        id="middlePolygonCatching" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Parallel Multiple Event
stencils.description: Process execution is delayed until all possible events have been triggered.
stencils.description_de: Im Laufe der Prozessausführung wird auf das Eintreten von allen Ereignissen gewartet bis die Ausführung fortgesetzt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle       id="bg_frame"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="15"       stroke="black"       fill="url(#background) white"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 5.5, 3" />           <circle       id="frame2_non_interrupting"       cx="16"       cy="16"       r="12"       stroke="black"       fill="none"       stroke-width="1"      style="stroke-dasharray: 4.5, 3" />           <circle id="frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>       <path        d="M 6.75,13 L6.75,19 L13,19 L13,25.75 L19,25.75 L19,19 L25.75,19 L25.75,13 L19,13 L19,6.75 L13,6.75 L13,13z"        id="path9"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />          <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Event
stencils.description: This event marks the occurrence of a particular business event. Process execution is not delayed.
stencils.description_de: Dieses Ereignis markiert das Erreichen eines definierten Zustandes im Prozess. Die Prozessausführung wird durch das Ereignis nicht verzögert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Message Event
stencils.description: The throwing message event sends a message to a communication partner and afterwards continues process execution.
stencils.description_de: Das auslösende Nachrichten-Zwischenereignis versendet eine Nachricht und setzt daraufhin die Prozessausführung unmittelbar fort.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle id="frame2" cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>       <path stroke="none" fill="black" stroke-width="1" d="M8,11 L8,21 L24,21 L24,11 L16,17z"/>  <path stroke="none" fill="black" stroke-width="1" d="M8,10 L16,16 L24 10z"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Escalation Event
stencils.description: This event triggers the escalation of the case to another role in the organisation. After this, process execution is resumed.
stencils.description_de: Symbolisiert die Eskalation des Vorgangs zu einer anderen Rolle in der Organisation (z.B. Vorgesetzter). Die Prozessausführung wird unmittelbar fortgesetzt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>    <path        d="M 16,8.75 L22,23.75 L16,17 L10,23.75z "        id="path9"        style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Link Event
stencils.description: Off-page connectors. Two corresponding link events correspond to a sequence flow.
stencils.description_de: Ein auslösendes und ein eintretendes Link-Ereignis mit dem selben Namen entspricht einer gedachten Sequenzfluss-Kante.

stencils.title: Intermediate Compensation Event
stencils.description: Triggers a compensation.
stencils.description_de: Auslösen einer Kompensation.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>          <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="15,9 15,23 8,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="22,9 22,23 15,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Signal Event
stencils.description: The throwing signal event fires up a signal. Afterwards it continues process execution. One signal thrown can be caught multiple times by different catching signal events.
stencils.description_de: Das auslösende Signal-Zwischenereignis erzeugt ein Signal und setzt daraufhin die Prozessausführung unmittelbar fort. Ein Signal kann von mehreren eintretenden Signal-Ereignissen aufgefangen werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>     <path     id="signalThrowing"        d="M 8.7124971,21.247342 L 23.333334,21.247342 L 16.022915,8.5759512 L 8.7124971,21.247342 z"        style="fill:black;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Intermediate Multiple Event
stencils.description: The throwing multiple event throws one out of a set of possible events. Afterwards it continues process execution.
stencils.description_de: Das auslösende Mehrfach-Zwischenereignis löst eines von mehreren möglichen Ereignissen aus und setzt daraufhin die Prozessausführung unmittelbar fort.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>     <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1"/>    <path    style="fill:black;   fill-opacity:1;   stroke:#000000;   stroke-width:1.4;   stroke-linejoin:bevel;   stroke-opacity:1"         d="M 20.834856,22.874369 L 10.762008,22.873529 L 7.650126,13.293421 L 15.799725,7.3734296 L 23.948336,13.294781 L 20.834856,22.874369 z"        id="middlePolygonThrowing" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Event
stencils.description: The untyped end event typically marks the standard end of a process.
stencils.description_de: Untypisiertes End-Ereignis, welches ein normales Ende eines Prozesses markiert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Message Event
stencils.description: At the end of the process, a message is sent.
stencils.description_de: Zum Abschluss des Prozesses wird noch eine Nachricht versendet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>     <path stroke="none" fill="black" stroke-width="1" d="M8,11 L8,21 L24,21 L24,11 L16,17z"/>  <path stroke="none" fill="black" stroke-width="1" d="M8,10 L16,16 L24 10z"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Escalation Event
stencils.description: The case is escalated with the end of the process.
stencils.description_de: Zum Ende des Prozesses findet eine Eskalation statt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>          <path        d="M 16,8.75 L22,23.75 L16,17 L10,23.75z "        id="path9"        style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Error Event
stencils.description: The process ends in an error state. As result a named error is thrown.
stencils.description_de: Der Prozess endet in einem Fehlerzustand. Es wird abschließend ein benannter Fehler geworfen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>          <path          style="fill:black;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.5;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-miterlimit:10"          d="M 22.820839,11.171502 L 19.36734,24.58992 L 13.54138,14.281819 L 9.3386512,20.071607 L 13.048949,6.8323057 L 18.996148,16.132659 L 22.820839,11.171502 z"          id="errorPolygon" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Cancel End Event
stencils.description: Triggering cancellation of a transaction.
stencils.description_de: Auslösen eines Abbruchs einer Transaktion.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">       <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>          <path d="M 9 9 L 23 23 M 9 23 L 23 9" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="5" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Compensation Event
stencils.description: Triggering compensation as final process step.
stencils.description_de: Als Abschluss des Prozesses wird eine Kompensationsanforderung geworfen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">       <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>          <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="15,9 15,23 8,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="22,9 22,23 15,16" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Signal Event
stencils.description: At the end of the process, a signal is thrown. (One signal thrown can be caught multiple times)
stencils.description_de: Zum Ende des Prozesses wird abschließend ein Signal hochgeworfen. (Auf dasselbe Signal kann an mehreren Stellen reagiert werden)
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <oryx:docker oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" />   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>     <path     id="signalThrowing"        d="M 8.7124971,21.247342 L 23.333334,21.247342 L 16.022915,8.5759512 L 8.7124971,21.247342 z"        style="fill:black;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1.4;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Multiple Event
stencils.description: At the end of the process, one out of a set of possible events is triggered.
stencils.description_de: Zum Ende des Prozesses wird abschließend eines von mehreren möglichen Ereignissen ausgelöst.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>      <path    style="fill:#000000;   fill-opacity:1;   stroke:#000000;   stroke-width:1;   stroke-linejoin:bevel;   stroke-opacity:1"         d="M 20.834856,22.874369 L 10.762008,22.873529 L 7.650126,13.293421 L 15.799725,7.3734296 L 23.948336,13.294781 L 20.834856,22.874369 z"        id="middlepolygon" />    <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Terminate End Event
stencils.description: Triggering the immediate termination of a process instance. All steps still in execution in parallel branches are terminated.
stencils.description_de: Löst die sofortige Beendigung einer Prozess-Instanz und aller seiner noch in Ausführung befindlichen (parallelen) Arbeitsschritte.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">       <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>          <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="9" stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Sequence Flow
stencils.description: Sequence Flow defines the execution order of activities.
stencils.description_de: Ein Sequenzfluss definiert die Reihenfolge der Ausführung von Aktivitäten.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="start" refX="1" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="17" markerHeight="11" orient="auto">      <path id="conditional" d="M 0 5 L 8 0 L 16 5 L 8 10 L 0 5" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />    <path id="default" d="M 5 0 L 11 10" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />     </marker>     <marker id="end" refX="15" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 1 L 15 6 L 0 11z" fill="black" stroke="black" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="condition" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: ConditionType
properties.description: Determine the typ of the flow object.
properties.description_de: Legt den Typ des Flussobjekts fest.

properties.title: isImmediate
properties.description: An optional Boolean value specifying whether Activities or Choreography Activities not in the model containing the Sequence Flow can occur between the elements connected by the Sequence Flow. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur. Also see the isClosed attribute on Process, Choreography, and Collaboration.

properties.title: is conditional flow
properties.description: System intern variable to set the Diamond invisible, if sourceShape is a gateway and ConditionType is set to Expression

stencils.title: Association (undirected)
stencils.description: Attaching a data object with an Undirected Association to a sequence flow indicates hand-over of information between the activities involved.
stencils.description_de: Die Zuordnung eines Datenobjekts zu einem Sequenzfluss über eine ungerichtete Assoziation weist auf eine Informationsübergabe zwischen den Aktivitäten hin.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" />   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: Responsibilities
properties.description: Describes the type of the responsibility according to RACI.
properties.description_de: Beschreibt die Verantwortlichkeiten nach dem RACI-Modell.

stencils.title: Association (unidirectional)
stencils.description: A Directed Association indicates information flow. A data object can be read at the start of an activity or written upon completion.
stencils.description_de: Eine gerichtete Assoziation zeigt den Informationsfluss. Ausgehende Kanten zeigen Schreiben, eingehende zeigen Lesen an.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10" fill="none" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Association (bidirectional)
stencils.description: A Bidirected Association indicates that the data object is modified, i.e. read and written during the execution of an actvity.
stencils.description_de: Eine beidseitig gericEhtete Assoziation zeigt, dass das Datenobjekt während der Ausführung einer Aktivität verändert, d.h. gelesen und geschrieben wird.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="start" refX="0" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 10 0 L 0 5 L 10 10" fill="none" stroke="black" />     </marker>     <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10" fill="none" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Message Flow
stencils.description: Message Flow symbolizes information flow across organizational boundaries. Message flow can be attached to pools, activities, or message events. The order of message exchanges can be specified by combining message flow and sequence flow.
stencils.description_de: Nachrichtenflüsse symbolisieren Informationen, die über organisatorische Grenzen hinweg fließen. Nachrichtenflüsse können an Pools, Aktivitäten oder Nachrichten-Ereignissen angeheftet sein. Die Abfolge von Nachrichtenaustauschen kann spezifiziert werden, indem Nachrichtenfluss und Sequenzfluss kombiniert werden.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>   <marker id="start" oryx:optional="yes" oryx:enabled="yes" refX="5" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <!-- <path d="M 10 10 L 0 5 L 10 0" fill="none" stroke="black" /> -->      <circle cx="5" cy="5" r="5" fill="white" stroke="black" />     </marker>      <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 L 0 0" fill="white" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="text_name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>  </g> </svg>
